scripts.testContracts: cd eth && sh waitForGanache.sh && npx truffle test test/contracts.test.js
scripts.testSesamed: cd eth && sh waitForGanache.sh && npx truffle test test/sesamed.si.test.js
scripts.lint: npx eslint src test eth/migrations eth/test
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.docs: npx jsdoc2md --property-list-format list --param-list-format list -t jsdoc2md/README.hbs src/*.js > README.md && node jsdoc2md/afterCareDocs.js
scripts.report-cover: npx nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && npx codecov
